Question
========
A ball is thrown straight up, reaches a maximum height, then falls back down to its initial height. Which of the following is true while the ball is going down?

Answerlist
----------
* Its velocity and acceleration both point up.
* Its velocity and acceleration both point down.
* Its velocity points up while its acceleration points down.
* Its velocity points down while its acceleration points up.

Solution
========
Both velocity and acceleration point down when the ball is going down.
